KA.IUHCI.content: man’s propensity t enter into society is also linked to a resistance (Widerstande) > man has a desire to associate (vergesellschaften) himself w/ other men and to isolate (vereinzelnen) himself: latter resistance, in society, can come in the form of vainglory and ambition [inclination as Hang or Neigung]

KA.EP.content: law as mutual impeding of evil private attitudes > nature wants that law achieve superior force > federation better than universal monarchy: desire of every ruler total permanent power
